None.Name: Blessed Revive
None.Description: Casts a charm upon the targeted friendly unit that will make it ressurect after 15 seconds if it dies within 20 seconds. The affected unit will gain an Ice Shield as soon as it is ressurected that absorbs up to 800 damage for 20 seconds. It cannot be killed by the player. Reusable every 20 seconds.
